thread.title: Ex-MACC chief calls for non-partisan fight against graft
thread.title_full: Ex-MACC chief calls for non-partisan fight against graft

title: Ex-MACC chief calls for non-partisan fight against graft
text:
More 
Former Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission chief Abu Kassim Mohamed has urged the people to stand united against corruption, regardless of their political ideologies. 
"All communities must reject political ideologies (when it comes to fighting corruption) because if corruption is used as the basis of politics, it will be difficult to resolve social issues. 
"We must stand together if corruption is to be eliminated," Abu Kassim told a congregation of 100 people at Masjid Al-Ikhlas in Shah Alam yesterday...
